periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 60, with temperatures rising to around 62 overnight. Southwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
